name: Pidgeot
flavorText:
When hunting, it
skims the surface
of water at high speed to pick off
unwary prey such
as MAGIKARP.

previous.name: Pidgeotto
previous.flavorText:
Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.

next.name: Rattata
next.flavorText:
Bites anything
when it attacks.
Small and very quick, it is a
common sight in
many places.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.flavorText:
A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.flavorText:
Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.
